casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Edilberto Jurado (13144)

Landau, Hennessy and Cketella, Js.

Argued March 16 decision released April 18, 1995 Richard S. Cramer, for the appellant (defendant). Nancy L. Gillespie, deputy assistant states’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were James E. Thomas, state’s attorney, and Michael G. Zuk, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
